english.segment1: I've got a monster to tame. It looks alot like your face. I said to let go of all your inhibitions with me. We'll make all our worries disappear with our feet
english.segment2: Don't worry. Don't worry. Come with me. Come with me. And move now. Slowly. Slowly. Sweat it out. Sweat it out
english.segment3: Don't stop pulling me closer. I love it when you let me fall to your hands. My favorite thing is when you don't stop dancing
english.segment4: I've got a monster to please. It says to dance with me. Pppplease violent dancer drag yourself to the floor. And don't stop swinging till we break down the doors
english.segment5: And swing now. Swing now. Twist around. Twist around. And move now. Further. Further. Sweat it out. Sweat it out
